pages.text: $(italic)Every time you want to enter the realm of the Endermen you have to travel half a world. Whoever created the portals to the End... you're so much more powerful than they are now.$(br2)Well, almost. You haven't yet figured out how to create such portals yourself, but pack them up and take them home? No problem.

pages.title: End Portal Relocation
pages.text: The end portal, like found in strongholds.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: These modified Eye of Ender harbor extremely destructive potential. They need to be, to be able to manipulate the extremely robust portal frame.$(br)When used in an End Portal base, you should keep your distance quickly.

pages.name: Reconstructed End Portal
pages.text: You just put the portal back together the way it was initially, add Ender Pearls, done!
